text.section: A person is guilty of conspiracy to promote gambling when he conspires to advance or profit from gambling activity.
"Conspire" means to engage in activity constituting a criminal conspiracy as defined in KRS 506.040.
Conspiracy to promote gambling is a Class D felony.

law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 243, effective January 1, 1975.
